name: p0ng (Cornifer_Caves)
description:
P0ng is a one player version of pong, you the padlle are an off-white square which can move and rotate. The ball is a green square. The aim to kill the red bois (dani could get behind that) and beat your highscore.

controls:

WASD, arrow keys

mouse

music:
https://www.youtube.com/c/flowerheadm...
